thread.title: LeBron James is blocking and dunking on the Chicago Bulls like it's the playoffs
thread.title_full: LeBron James is blocking and dunking on the Chicago Bulls like it's the playoffs

author: Tim Cato
title: LeBron James is blocking and dunking on the Chicago Bulls like it's the playoffs
text:
James cares not for the Bulls’ troubles.
Hello. Meet LeBron James, who you definitely already know and absolutely understand can throw down very large and aggressive dunks.
Did you also know he could viciously and savagely block — without remorse — anyone in the league off the glass if they attempt a layup?
Oh, yeah, you probably knew that too. This LeBron fella — he’s going to be pretty good, I’d say.
